More Service Cloud Features

Required Editions: Available in both Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience, Essentials, Group, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

Cases Home:
Create, locate, and edit cases.
Case Fields:
Information about case progress and associated records.

Case History:
Tracks changes to the case, including date, time, nature of change, and who made it. Modifications to related lists not tracked.

Case Hierarchies:
Associates cases with a parent case for easy tracking or division into multiple cases.

Related Cases:
Associates cases with a parent case for easy tracking or division into multiple cases.

Changes to the Cases and Case Feed Mobile App: Various changes to the Cases and Case Feed Mobile App.
title: Mastering Salesforce Service Cloud Cases
